00022 inline Cell* make_int(int i)
00023 {
00024   Cell* int_cell = (Cell*)malloc(sizeof(Cell));
00025   if (!int_cell) {
00026     std::cerr << "ERROR" << std::endl;
00027     exit(1);
00028   }
00029   int_cell->tag_m = type_int;
00030   int_cell->int_m = i;
00031   return int_cell;
00032 }

00054 inline Cell* make_symbol(const char* s)
00055 {
00056   Cell* symbol_cell = (Cell*)malloc(sizeof(Cell));
00057   if (!symbol_cell) {
00058     std::cerr << "ERROR" << std::endl;
00059     exit(1);
00060   }
00061   symbol_cell->tag_m = type_symbol;
00062   char* cpy_str = (char*)malloc((strlen(s) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00063   if (!cpy_str) {
00064     std::cerr << "ERROR" << std::endl;
00065     exit(1);
00066   }
00067   strcpy(cpy_str, s);
00068   symbol_cell->symbol_m = cpy_str;
00069   return symbol_cell;
00070 }

00078 inline Node* make_node(Cell* my_elem, Node* my_next)
00079 {
00080   Node* new_node = (Node*)malloc(sizeof(Node));
00081   if (!new_node) {
00082     std::cerr << "ERROR" << std::endl;
00083     exit(1);
00084   }
00085   new_node->elem_m = my_elem;
00086   new_node->next_m = my_next;
00087   return new_node;
00088 }

00094 inline bool intp(const Cell* c)
00095 {
00096   return (c->tag_m == type_int);
00097 }

00103 inline bool doublep(const Cell* c)

00105   return (c->tag_m == type_double);

00112 inline bool symbolp(const Cell* c)
00113 {
00114   return (c->tag_m == type_symbol);

00121 inline int get_int(const Cell* c)
00122 {
00123   if (intp(c)) {
00124     return c->int_m;
00125   }
00126   else {
00127     std::cerr << "ERROR" << std::endl;
00128     exit(1);
00129   }
00130 }

00167 inline Cell* get_elem(const Node* n)
00168 {
00169   return n->elem_m;
00170 }
00171 
00176 inline Node* get_next(const Node* n)
00177 {
00178   return n->next_m;

00186 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Node& n)
00187 {
00188   const Node* current_node = &n;
00189   Cell* elem = NULL;
00190   os << "(";
00191   while (current_node != NULL) {
00192     if (get_elem(current_node)) {
00193       elem = get_elem(current_node);
00194       if (intp(elem)) {os << get_int(elem) << " ";}
00195       else if (doublep(elem)) {os << get_double(elem) << " ";}
00196       else if (symbolp(elem)) {os << get_symbol(elem) << " ";}
00197     }
00198     current_node = get_next(current_node);
00199   }
00200   if (elem) {os << '\b';}
00201   os << ")";
00202   return os;
00203 }
